How do i make windows the default operat: I mean, are you using grub? Use the default option, point it to the Windows stanza by number.
find out the number by counting the title lines, starting with 0
I should say that I'm talking about the file /boot/grub/menu.lst
this is neat: 'grep ^title /boot/grub/menu.lst | nl -v 0' to see which boot stanza is which by number.
